item.title: Magic Beans - DuckCTF 2023
item.description: Hidden beneath this strange jelly bean themed website is a flag; a flag hidden within a table aptly named Flag, and sprinkled letter-by-letter along single character columns titled 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', ...
